OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD SPORTS COMMENTARIES COMMITTEE FOR HOSPITAL PATIENTS AND THE BLIND

Desc.entry: A registered charity that provides live commentaries to hospital patients and the blind from Sheffield Wednesday and Sheffield United football matches. Hospital patients can access the radio via Patientline bed side services free of charge (TV, phone and email is chargeable). Visually impaired people attending football matches can receive the broadcast commentary from anywhere in the stadium but need to telephone prior to attending to arrange a headset.
